name: Webventure
description:
This adventure follows the story of two spider friends, bound together by an invisible web, growing stronger with every challenge they overcome. During their fun, fascinating journey, our little protagonists will unravel the forest's mysteries, learn the value of teamwork, and discover that friendship can triumph over any evil.

WITH SMARTS AND WEB

Spinning webs is what spiders do best. Use your web to overcome obstacles: run across the ceiling, trap flies, move things, and help each other in moments of danger.


CO-OP EXPERIENCE FOR TWO PLAYERS

Enjoy the unforgettable, fun- and adventure-filled moments together as you navigate the exciting gameplay in tandem. Your success will hinge on your ability to work together and engage with your surroundings. The game for two players can be played using a single keyboard or using a gamepad. The game also has a single-player mode in case you want to truly immerse yourself in the adventure all on your own.


ATMOSPHERIC SETTING

You will find yourself in diverse locations, ranging from murky catacombs with spell-binding underground tunnels to dark, sublime forests haunted by spirits. Immerse yourself in this atmospheric world and uncover its secrets!
